channel.title: Vineet's Github Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Vineet's Github Portfolio

item.title: LFP Spectrogram Viewier (SGView)
item.description: New DBS hardware lets us record from the implanted DBS lead. Being able to quickly assess the quality of the recordings at the patient’s bedside is crucial to maximize the signal-to-noise in the recordings. I developed a MATLAB based UI for LFP spectrogram assessment. Header Level 2

item.title: SGView - A dLFP viewer
item.description: SGView A viewer for differential LFP recordings like those recorded in next-generation clinical DBS devices.
